info.name: Lainchan Comfy Compact
info.description:
A compact theme for lainchan.org with a mascot. Includes a convenient fixed post form. You can replace the mascot with your own by replacing the base64 encoded image at the end of the css file.

GitLab: https://gitlab.com/newstyledesu/lainchan
info.additionalInfo:
9/30 - Fixed some thumbnail alignment issues. Made multi-file thumbnails more compact. Changed headings and links to be more visible.

9/27 - Fixed an error where the mascot would not appear on /random/. Converted the mascot to base64 encoding so that it does not rely on a third party host. This is highly convienent and more secure, however the size of the theme will be larger. If you want to convert your own mascot to base64 use base64-image.de

9/24 - Changed the style for all buttons; Adjusted some margins between posts and images; Themed homepage and misc. pages.
